paper_abstract: Recently, a, new learning algorithm for single-hidden-layer feedforward neural network (SLFN) named the complex extreme learning machine (C-ELM) has been proposed in [I]. In this paper, we propose a numerically robust recursive least square type C-ELM algorithm. The proposed algorithm improves the performance of C-ELM especially in finite numerical precision. The computer simulation results in the various precision cases show the proposed algorithm improves the numerical robustness of C-ELM.
paper_title: Robust recursive complex extreme learning machine algorithm for finite numerical precision
